name: Pricing Manager
description:
Syngenta is a leading agriculture company helping to improve global food security by enabling millions of farmers to make better use of available resources. Through world class science and innovative crop solutions, our 28,000 people in over 90 countries are working to transform how crops are grown. We are committed to rescuing land from degradation, enhancing biodiversity and revitalizing rural communities.

Accountabilities:

  • Establish and pro-actively manage an appropriate commercial governance between Region and BUs, including key processes like price setting, in-season adjustment, commercial terms and loyalty programs
  • Establish and proactively manage the interfaces to Regional Portfolio Managers and to Pricing within the BU (tailored, depending on local BU design)
  • Be subject matter expert and further develop Pricing methodologies & tools, eg price radar, price/volume trade-offs, value pricing
  • Assess Pricing capabilities on Regional and BU level and support in developing those capabilities
  • Transfer best practice between BUs (Pricing & Commercial Terms)
  • Deep-dive into selected, critical pricing topics to support the Portfolio teams in creating additional value for SYT
  • Work closely with Finance and Data Analysts to create and deliver value-adding, insightful reports for the Regional and BU teams
  • Work closely with Market Intelligence team to collect market & competitive information in order to best support effective pricing decisions
  • Become a valued business partner to Regional Portfolio Management as well as to the local BU Commercial Leadership

Requirements:

  • At least 3 years of experience in the field of pricing
  • Experience working with international teams
  • Excellent analytical skills
  • Good team player
  • Excellent MS Office skills
  • English - Fluent
